column2: Increases the objective's maximum supply hold size by 400.
Obtained from Kailani the Foolhardy near Fangfury Watch Waypoint in the Fields of Ruin.
Your group is currently being advertised. To make changes to your category selection, please remove your group from the active search.
Find the tiger den in the cliffs above the Tower of Modius.
Double-click to open. Contains 5 Badges of Honor and a Resonating Sliver.
There are currently no groups available matching the search criteria you have selected. Try selecting a different category or starting your own listing in the system.
<c=@abilitytype>Deception.</c> Shadowstep and unleash an attack that blinds your target and nearby foes. You may reactivate this skill to return to your original position.
Damage and condition damage is increased.

After completing the Scratching Post, craft a Tiger Pole and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.
—Control capture points to earn points for your team.

Tips and tricks for training your tiger, by Cymbel.
Double-click to access your tiger den.

Craft Infused Tiger Milk and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.

Obtain a jungle wurm egg by defeating the Greater Nightmare Vine in Twilight Arbor. Bring it to the Mossman's hut in the Swampland fractal.
This item only has value as part of a collection. Consume to add to collection.
Double-click to open. Contains a Pristine Fractal Relic and a Resonating Sliver.

Craft Basic Tiger Food and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.
Speak with Bagred the Hunter in Snowden Drifts to learn to craft a book that Bagred can use to create a hunter's journal.

Salutations,

Your efforts in the Forsaken Thicket are the stuff of legend. It has come to my attention that you have assembled a very remarkable set of armor, and I would like to offer my expertise to help improve it to make a truly legendary creation.

Find me in Lion's Arch.

—Giita

Based on ancient asuran research done by the supergenius Zinn, Taimi has devised a way to counter certain powerful magic abilities. Learn this Mastery to gain access to the Counter Magic special action skill that allows you to turn your enemy's attacks back on themselves.

Virtue: Regenerate health.
Activate: Draw forth an enchanted tome that recounts the trials undergone by the people of Vabbi.
Each tome skill use consumes a page.
Thrust your greatsword into the ground, damaging foes and removing a boon.
Double-click to open. Contains various pieces of ore, a Resonating Sliver, and a Writ of Experience.

Virtue: Gain aegis periodically.
Activate:Conjure a mystic tome containing stories about the heroes of Istan.
Each tome skill use consumes a page.

Complete the Snowblind Challenge (scale 21–50)! Beat Shaman Lornarr Dragonseeker with an 80%% reduction to all healing!
To activate challenge mode, speak with the challenge mote near the beginning of the fractal. A party vote is required to activate.
You must open the package of old equipment in your inventory to do this.

This will replace the appearance of any back item and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe. 

This backpack skin has no stats of its own.
<c=@abilitytype>Burst.</c> Release a conical wave of sound that blows away boons on targets it hits. Stuns foes using skills.
Currently this squad is being advertised in LFG. When a squad is being advertised in LFG, it cannot change its Join permission setting.

This worn book is covered in notes and drawings.
Double-click to access your tiger den.
The doors of the arena have closed.
Push back all foes in front of you with a wave of magical energy.
<c=@abilitytype>Deception.</c> Vanish in stealth and cure conditions. Then gain regeneration and heal yourself.

Mantra. Recite a hymn from the annals of Turai to hasten yourself and allies.
The final charge of this ability is more powerful.

Complete the Uncategorized Challenge (scale 21–50)! Beat the raving asura with an 80%% reduction to all healing!
To activate challenge mode, speak with the challenge mote near the beginning of the fractal. A party vote is required to activate.
<c=@abilitytype>Burst.</c> Jump to the targeted location and slam your hammer down, damaging and stunning foes.
<c=@abilitytype>Trick.</c> Cure conditions, then roll backward while healing and evading attacks.
Double-click to open. Contains shards of glory, a Resonating Sliver, and bonus experience for your current reward track.
Complete the Coddler's Cove jumping puzzle near Mellagan's Grotto in Timberline Falls while carrying a tiger cub.
You have joined too many groups recently. Please wait a moment before trying to join again.
Double-click to unpack scribing supplies used for master recipes.
Obtained from the champion jungle skelk lurker near Firebreak Fort in Mount Maelstrom.

Craft Nutritional Tiger Milk and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.
Conjure a magical axe to rake your enemies toward you.
Fortifies the objective with a waypoint.
<c=@abilitytype>Tome</c> skills gain bonuses from scribbling in the margins by ancient bards.
Complete the Spirit of the Tiger achievement and unlock this mini in your wardrobe.
You must be in a raid squad to enter the training area.
Double-click to open. Contains a Pristine Fractal Relic, 3 +1 Agony Infusions, a Resonating Sliver, a Tome of Knowledge, a Stabilizing Matrix, and Fractal Encryption Key.

Tips and tricks for training your tiger, by Cymbel.
Unlocks the Tiger Training Guide subcollection.
Defeat Ulgoth the Modniir in Harathi Hinterlands while carrying a tiger cub.

This will replace the appearance of any back item and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe. 

This backpack skin has no stats of its own.
Your group is currently listed for other players to find.
<c=@abilitytype>Burst.</c> Ignite target area, burning nearby foes. Effect increases with adrenaline level.

A record of your exploits as a hunter.
Unlocks the Hunter's Journal subcollection.
Advanced Notes on Artificial Tiger Milk

Granting quickness to an ally also grants Ashes of the Just.
This can affect multiple targets simultaneously.

Greetings,

Your deeds in the Forsaken Thicket are well known. It has come to my attention that you have assembled a very remarkable set of armor, and I would like to offer my expertise to help improve it to make a truly legendary creation.

If you are interested, come talk to me in Lion's Arch.
Talk to Cymbel at Cymbel's Rescue in the Fields of Ruin after completing any event involving her hounds.
Double-click to choose a set of ascended armor.
Double-click to choose a set of ascended armor.
Periodically gain stability. Immune to critical hits.
The group is currently full and cannot be joined.

Complete the Aetherblade challenge (scale 51–100). Beat Engineer Frizz with an 80%% reduction to all healing.
To activate challenge mode, speak with the challenge mote near the beginning of the fractal. A party vote is required to activate. This item only has value as part of a collection.
You must select a filter from the left before you can advertise your group.
-The first team to reach the score limit wins.
<c=@abilitytype>Burst.</c> Fire a powerful shot. Damage increases with adrenaline level.
